member.name: T:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.ExtendedSerializationBinder
member.summary: Extends serialization binder to improve performance and to also allow custom type mappings to be added easily using . Also simplifies type and assembly names making binding across multiple versions far more reliable. (Includes fix for simplification of generic type names).

member.name: F:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.ExtendedSerializationBinder.Default
member.summary: The default extended serialization binder.

member.name: F:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.ExtendedSerializationBinder._typeMap
member.summary: Maps old types to new types.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.ExtendedSerializationBinder.BindToType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Overrides the default binder, firstly by using a cache of s based on the assembly name and type name, speeding up type binding, but also allowing easy overrides using .
member.param: Specifies the name of the serialized object.
Specifies the name of the serialized object.
member.exception: The type map contains the maximum number of elements.

member.summary: Maps an old type to a new type during serialization.

The name of the old type.

The name of the old type.
member.exception: The type map contains the maximum number of elements.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Member cannot be serialized. {0}.

member.name: P:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Resources.XmlFormatter_InitializeObject_MemberListIsNull

member.name: T:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Serialize
member.summary: A class used to assist in implementing serialization code, adds transparent support for Xml serialization (both and ). Also adds easy support for mapping old types to new types, using .
member.remarks: A good article on surrogates can be found at (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-gb/magazine/cc188950.aspx).

member.name: F:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Serialize._surrogates
member.summary: Holds all of the serialization surrogates.

member.name: M:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Serialize.#cctor
member.summary: Loads standard serialization surrogates.

member.name: P:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Serialize.SurrogateSelector
member.summary: Gets the standard surrogate selector, which includes support for additional types. Additional types can be registered to the surrogate selector with .
member.value: A object which contains both the standard surrogates and any additional surrogates added with the in its list of checked surrogates.

member.name: M:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.Serialize.AddOrUpdateSurrogate``1(System.Type)
member.summary: Adds a new serialization surrogate. If the surrogate already exists then it is instead updated.

member.name: T:WebApplications.Utilities.Serialization.XmlFormatter
member.summary: The class implements a custom XML Formatter, which uses the interface. The class implements the interface to serialize and deserialize the object to an XML representation.
member.remarks: The class calls the methods of on the object if the object supports this interface. If not, the class will use Reflection to examine the public fields and properties of the object. When adding objects that inherit or implement , , the element of the list should be passed as an array to .

member.summary: The serialization binder used to map object types to names.

member.summary: Contains a list with objects that implement the interface.
